name: Project ACME
description: Internal terms and acronyms specific to the ACME project

definitions.definition: Quality Review System - Our internal code review and quality assurance platform
Lightning Module Zero - The core authentication and authorization service
Data Analytics and Reporting Tool - The business intelligence dashboard
The next-generation customer portal project
Our internal API gateway that routes requests between microservices
Fast Analytics Load Controller - The real-time data processing pipeline
Security Hardening Infrastructure for Enterprise Load Distribution
Team Operations and Planning System - Our sprint planning and tracking tool
The infrastructure and DevOps team responsible for cloud architecture
The security team that performs penetration testing and vulnerability assessments
The sustainability and efficiency team focused on reducing resource consumption
The original monolithic application that we're migrating from
The new microservices-based architecture we're migrating to
Our custom story point system based on complexity and effort
Critical production issues that require immediate attention
The isolated development environment for testing new features
The pre-production environment that mirrors production configuration
A deployment strategy where changes are rolled out to a small subset of users first
Weekly Architecture Review - Our weekly meeting to discuss system design decisions
Design Review Board - The committee that approves major architectural changes
